error_details.explanation: Input misrepresentation. The target distance for the first one is 5 miles, not 8 miles.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 96
The first one runs a mile in 7 minutes because 21 / 3 = <<21/3=7>>7
The second runs a mile in 8 minutes because 24 / 3 = <<24/3=8>>8
The first one would finish 8 miles in 56 minutes because 8 x 7 = <<8*7=56>>56
The second one would finish in 40 minutes because 5 x 8 = <<5*8=40>>40
It will take 96 minutes in total because 56 + 40 = <<56+40=96>>96
